external_references.source_name: Microsoft Storm-501 Sabbath Ransomware Embargo September 2024
external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2024, September 26). Storm-0501: Ransomware attacks expanding to hybrid cloud environments. Retrieved October 19, 2025.

objects.description: [Storm-0501](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1053) used the PowerShell module [AADInternals](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0677) to create a back door within the victim tenant, thus allowing for the impersonation of any user in the organization and bypassing MFA to sign in to any application to include Office 365.(Citation: Microsoft Storm-501 Sabbath Ransomware Embargo September 2024)
